shark_ana.title: Shark Ana Le My Nga – Strategic Advisor Partnering with Smartcom Solutions
shark_ana.p1: On its journey of development and positioning as a pioneering enterprise in applying AI in practice, Smartcom Solutions officially announces its strategic partnership with Shark Ana Le My Nga – one of the most influential investors, advisors, and entrepreneurs in the fields of technology, education, and innovation in Vietnam.
shark_ana.p2: As a Strategic Advisor, Shark Ana brings a broad vision and directly supports Smartcom in building effective growth models in the company's core areas.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To become the leading enterprise in Vietnam in providing comprehensive technology and training solutions, with AI at its core, helping businesses optimize performance and achieve sustainable development in the digital era.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Committed to delivering high-quality products and services that integrate advanced technology and in-depth knowledge, to empower businesses, enhance their competitiveness, and co-create outstanding values.

items.title: Technology Solutions Consulting & IT Equipment Distribution
items.description: With extensive experience in consulting and implementing technology systems, Shark Ana contributes to enhancing Smartcom Solutions' capacity for comprehensive technology consulting and solution provision. The company is now a trusted partner in supplying IT equipment and synchronized digitization solutions, helping clients optimize operational efficiency and prepare for digital transformation.

items.title: In-depth Corporate Training & Coaching
items.description: Shark Ana directs Smartcom Solutions to apply AI in internal training activities, from digitizing content and personalizing the learning experience to measuring learning performance in real-time. As a result, Smartcom Solutions has been delivering in-depth, hands-on training programs, helping businesses enhance their team's capabilities effectively and sustainably.

items.title: AI-Powered Full-Service Advertising & Marketing
items.description: Smartcom Solutions develops integrated marketing services, applying AI technology to analyze user behavior, automate campaigns, optimize costs, and enhance communication effectiveness. This is a direction that Shark Ana particularly emphasizes – helping businesses not only reach the right audience but also create sustainable value in their brand-building journey.

items.answer: We work with a diverse range of industries, including technology, finance, retail, and manufacturing, providing tailored solutions for each.

items.question: How do I start a project with you?
items.answer: To get started, simply contact us through the form on our website or give us a call. We'll schedule a free consultation to discuss your needs and how we can help.

items.question: What is the average project timeline?
items.answer: Project timelines vary depending on the scope and complexity. After our initial consultation, we will provide you with a detailed roadmap and specific milestones.

items.question: Do you offer support after the project is completed?
items.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing support and maintenance packages to ensure your solution remains robust and effective. We believe in building long-term partnerships.

items.title: Cybersecurity for SMEs: What You Need to Know

items.content:
In the digital world, security is not an option. Learn the essential steps to protect your business's digital assets. This guide breaks down complex cybersecurity concepts into manageable actions for Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs).
